resources.string: NEARGRID needs camera access to capture photos and videos for your posts. This permission is only used when you actively take photos or videos.
NEARGRID needs photo library access to add your saved photos and videos to posts. We only access the media files you select.
NEARGRID needs location access to show nearby posts on the map and share location-based content. Location data is only used for map navigation and creating posts.
NEARGRID needs notification permission to notify you about new comments, likes, follows, and other important activities. You can turn notifications on or off in settings at any time.
